description.value:
Starting when you choose this origin at 1st level, your spellcasting can unleash surges of untamed magic. Once per turn, the DM can have you roll a [[/r d20]] immediately after you cast a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher. If you roll a 1, roll on the @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-roll-tables.TlFLSHz9qmEoNa4X]{Wild Magic Surge Table} to create a magical effect. If that effect is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-class-features.jFf6aDX2Ze409fwr]{Metamagic}, and if it normally requires concentration, it doesn't require concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.

Note: Automate this feature using the Wild Magic Surge 5e module and do the following:

  • Edit the module setting "Roll Table Name" and set it to "Wild Magic Surge Table"

  • Add @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-roll-tables.TlFLSHz9qmEoNa4X]{Wild Magic Surge Table} to the world's local Rollable Tables.
